sentences.en: ...the European and Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

sentences.en: Any day now, the Northern forces may pour across the new border.
sentences.cn: 北方的军队现在随时都可能大批越过新边界。

sentences.en: Caesar marched north into the forests that border the Danube River.
sentences.cn: 恺撒挥师北上，深入到多瑙河沿岸的森林地带。

sentences.en: countries that border the Mediterranean
sentences.cn: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.en: Currency-conversion costs remain one of the biggest obstacles to cross-border trade.
sentences.cn: 货币兑换成本仍是跨境贸易的最大障碍之一。

sentences.en: Everything along the border has its price: drugs, teak, smuggled goods.
sentences.cn: 边境上所有的东西都有定价，毒品、柚木和走私品无一例外。

sentences.en: Gray is thought to be in hiding near the France/Italy border.
sentences.cn: 他们认为格雷藏在法国和意大利边境附近。

sentences.en: He tried to strangle a border policeman and steal his gun.
sentences.cn: 他企图勒死一名边防警察并偷走他的枪。

sentences.en: He was never able to get past the border guards.
sentences.cn: 他从未能够通过边防哨兵的检查。

sentences.en: His confidence bordered on arrogance.
sentences.cn: 他的自信近乎自负。

sentences.en: Hungary's opening of the border was a turning point for the refugees.
sentences.cn: 匈牙利开放边境对难民来说是个转机。

sentences.en: It's a similar picture across the border in Ethiopia.
sentences.cn: 在边界那边的埃塞俄比亚，情况也大致相似。

sentences.en: Machine parts were also being shuttled across the border without authorisation.
sentences.cn: 机器零部件也在未经批准的情况下出入边境。

sentences.en: Soldiers had temporarily closed the border between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 士兵们已暂时封闭了两国的边界。

sentences.en: The border between science fact and science fiction gets a bit fuzzy.
sentences.cn: 科学事实和科幻小说之间的界限变得有点儿模糊了。

sentences.en: The point of entry into Zambia would be the Chirundu border post.
sentences.cn: 想要进入赞比亚应该经由奇龙杜边防哨所。

sentences.en: There are reports of fresh troop movements across the border.
sentences.cn: 有报告说，新近有军队越过边境。

sentences.en: They fled across the border.
sentences.cn: 他们越过边界逃走了。

sentences.en: This very careful attitude to money can sometimes border on meanness.
sentences.cn: 这种对待金钱的过分谨慎的态度有时几近于吝啬。

sentences.en: To cross the border, you will need a valid passport.
sentences.cn: 过边境需要持有效护照。

sentences.en: writing paper with a black border
sentences.cn: 饰有黑边的信纸

sentences.en: Yesterday's resolution says the present Polish border is "inviolable".
sentences.cn: 昨天的决议称现在的波兰边界是“不可侵犯的”。

words.tran_cn: 给…镶边；邻接；接近（border的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 边界网关（位于自治域之间的路由器）

trans.tran_cn: 边界（地区），边疆，包边，花带
trans.tran_en: a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material
if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it

trans.tran_cn: 给…加上边， 围； 邻接， 毗连
trans.tran_en: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
